text: "Better Than This" is the first promotional single by Norwegian singer- songwriter Marion Raven, from her latest album Scandal Vol. 2. The single was released through iTunes in Norway on December 16, 2014, and released internationally on February 17, 2015 digitally through iTunes. "Better than This" has already been featured on Norwegian television through TV programs such as the final of Idol Norge, and radio programs, featuring the acoustic version of the single. In addition to being part of the new album "Scandal, Vol. 2", it is also included in the international version of his album Songs from a Blackbird released in September of last year.
title: Better Than This (song by Marion Raven)
